name: Jquery-inline-form
tagline: A Jquery plugin that will turn an element into a text input when you click on it
body:
### The JQuery Inline Form
This is a small JQuery plugin that turns any element into a form that toggles intelligently.
For CRUD applications where people need to be able to update data, this works pretty well 

### Requires Bootstrap 3.0.x
This plugin uses Twitter Bootstrap for styling and icons so your page will have to include Bootstrap js and css in order to work

### Authors and Contributors
Authored by @ldenison in 2014
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
